alert.note: Alert for Beaver (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Warning issued April 07 at 4:32PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a Fire Warning at the request of Oklahoma Forestry Services for northern Beaver County. * AT 429 PM CDT, a dangerous wildfire was located 5 miles northeast of Forgan, or 10 miles northeast of Beaver, moving rapidly southeast at 3 to 5 mph. * Areas impacted...Rural areas of north central Beaver County, primarily east of Forgan, along and east of State Highway 23, and along US Highway 64. $$ Ferguson
info.instruction: Be prepared to evacuate quickly if requested and follow all safety instructions from local emergency management officials. Do not drive into smoke. Firefighters and incident responders should anticipate extreme fire behavior including a wind-driven and torching fire.
